snippet: Britain's Andy Pozzi put years of injury woes behind him to  clinch the 60 metres hurdles gold medal at the European indoor athletics championships on Friday and claim his first international title....

headline.main: Man Arrested After Attack on Homeless Person 'Decoy'
headline.print_headline: Man Arrested After Attack on Homeless Person 'Decoy'

lead_paragraph: Britain's Andy Pozzi put years of injury woes behind him to  clinch the 60 metres hurdles gold medal at the European indoor athletics championships on Friday and claim his first international title.
